short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension designed to stop meaningless spending of time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The average person spends 6 hours a day in front of a screen, totaling 9 years over the course of an average lifetime.

This extension prevents you from succumbing to this habit, with no room for excuses. Disabling it would require the somewhat embarrassing act of uninstalling it.
